title: OpenAI o3 and o4-mini: The Complete Developer's Guide
title1: OpenAI o3 and o4-mini: The Complete Developer's Guide
title2: OpenAI o3 and o4-mini: The Complete Developer's Guide
description: OpenAI's newest reasoning models bring tool integration, visual thinking, and cost-efficiency to developers. Learn everything about o3 and o4-mini's capabilities, benchmarks, real-world performance, and how to safely migrate your applications to these powerful new models.
author: Yusuf Ishola
